General.Name: KNW Co. Ltd
General.Description: KNW Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells high-tech materials for display industry and materials of automobile components. It offers design oriented films used for PDP and LCD TV filters, mobile filters, and home appliances/advertisement products; and silicone blankets for roll printing, PDP, and LCD applications. The company also provides functional coating materials comprising bead coating, hard coating, and anti-fingerprint coating materials; and adhesive coatings for producing special tapes. In addition, it offers laminating sponge materials used in components embedded in automobiles; and inorganic tapes used for fixing hot wires of automobile, as well as felt, a fabric to fix hot wires of automobile to the seat. The company was formerly known as KMW Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KNW Co., Ltd. in August 2008. KNW Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Paju-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Munsan High-tech Ind. Complex 5-1 B/L, Paju-Si, South Korea
